nodes.text: 038145 was an accident report concerning a fire in the central shaft of Level 12, Sector B, in the city of Morjanssik on the planet Dac. The fire started in one of the processors; security reported that several workers testified that the processor in question had been recently serviced and was in working order. The fire was extinguished by seven service droids that had been retasked from other levels to combat the blaze. Two workers were killed by smoke inhalation, and six were admitted to the infirmary. Financial costs for damages incurred in the accident were reported as 15,000 Galactic Credit Standards. New equipment was requisitioned to replace what was lost.
